CustomField.description:
The name of the database. Must start with a letter and can contain letters and numbers only. No special characters allowed. Max length: 48 Please do NOT enter the database name with .appfolio.com
Updated R1814492
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the database. Must start with a letter and can contain letters and numbers only. No special characters allowed. Max length: 48 Please do NOT enter the database name with .appfolio.com
CustomField.label: DB Name
